TEST.0.title: North Carolina Division B State Test

CIPHER.25.cipherString: There is one other reason for dressing well, namely that dogs respect it, and will not attack you in good clothes.
CIPHER.25.question: in Emerson: A Modern Anthology, Ralph Waldo Emerson offered this advice.  However it has been encrypted as an Aristocrat.  What does he tell us?

CIPHER.42.cipherString: El secreto de la existencia humana no solo está en vivir, sino también en saber para qué se vive.
CIPHER.42.question: A quote by the Russian novelist Fyodor Dostoevsky has been translated into Spanish and then encoded as an Aristocrat with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  What does it say?
CIPHER.42.translation: The secret of human existence is not only to live, but also to know what life is for.

CIPHER.43.cipherString: Nothing is faster than the speed of light. To prove this to yourself, try opening the refrigerator door before the light comes on.
CIPHER.43.question: We don't know who said this, but it certainly sounds like a fun experiment for this phrase which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.  What does it say?

CIPHER.31.cipherString: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
CIPHER.31.question: Although there have many people who have said similar things over the years, Reader's Digest attributes this quote to the singer and actor Jimmy Dean.  It has been encoded as an Aristocrat where you will find the word "WIND" in it somewhere.

CIPHER.26.cipherString: Self-consciousness is the enemy of all art, be it acting, writing, painting, or living itself, which is the greatest art of all.
CIPHER.26.question: Although this looks like some writing straight out of The Martian Chronicles, please decode this quote by Ray Bradbury which has been encoded using the Masonic Cipher.

CIPHER.35.cipherString: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
CIPHER.35.question: Over one hundred years ago, Henry Van Dyke offered this advice which has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet.  It ends with the word "HIGHER"

CIPHER.40.keyword: FOUR SCORE AND SEVEN YEARS AGO OUR FATHERS BROUGHT FORTH ON THIS CONTINENT, A NEW NATION, CONCEIVED IN LIBERTY, AND DEDICATED TO THE PROPOSITION THAT ALL MEN ARE CREATED EQUAL.
CIPHER.40.cipherString: I have a quantum car. Every time I look at the speedometer I get lost...
CIPHER.40.question: The comedian Steven Wright wants to tell us about a science problem that he has, but it has been encoded using the Running Key cipher against a famous document.  What was he trying to tell us?

CIPHER.29.cipherString: We feel that even if all possible scientific questions be answered, the problems of life have still not been touched at all.
CIPHER.29.question: In his famous Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus, the Austrian philosopher Ludwig Wittgenstein writes a proposition that has been encoded using the Caesar cipher.  What does it decode to?

CIPHER.41.cipherString: I'm a mathematical optimist: I deal only with positive integers.
CIPHER.41.question: Environmental professor Tendai Chitewere provides an outlook on science with a phrase that has been encoded using the Vigenère cipher with a common four letter word.   The 11th through 15th letters (FMJOX) decode to TICAL.  What is he telling us?

CIPHER.36.cipherString: OK, so what's the speed of dark?
CIPHER.36.question: Encrypt this question from the American comedian Stephen Wright using the Affine with a=7, and b=7

CIPHER.32.cipherString: Everyone is a genius at least once a year; a real genius has his original ideas closer together.
CIPHER.32.question: Solve this Aristocrat by the German scientist Georg Lichtenberg.   Somewhere in this Aristocrat you will find the word ONCE occur once.

CIPHER.38.cipherString: Science fiction is no more written for scientists that ghost stories are written for ghosts.
CIPHER.38.question: in Penguin Science Fiction, author Brian Aldiss wrote this observation which has been encoded using a Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.34.cipherString: Ewe lose nothing when fighting four a cause ... Inn my mined the losres are those who don't have a cuase they care about.
CIPHER.34.question: Your friend is trying to inspire you with an Aristocrat that is a quote by Muhammad Ali, unfortunately they don't spell very well when typing it in.  What does it decrypt to say?

CIPHER.37.cipherString: I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals, I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants.
CIPHER.37.question: A statement by the comedian A. Whitney Brown, who appeared on Saturday Night Live and The Daily Show has been encoded with the Vigenère cipher using a keyword of PAPER.  What was he saying?

CIPHER.30.cipherString: When people think about computer science, they imagine people with pocket protectors and thick glasses who code all night.
CIPHER.30.question: Google employee #20 and the former CEO of Yahoo!, Marissa Mayer offers this astute observation which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.  What did she say?

CIPHER.33.cipherString: The function of science fiction is not always to predict the future but sometimes to prevent it.
CIPHER.33.question: The author of Dune, Frank Herbert , made this statement about literature.  It has been encoded as an Aristocrat for you to decode.

CIPHER.27.cipherString: I can't give you a sure-fire formula for success, but I can give you a formula for failure: try to please everybody all the time.
CIPHER.27.question: This quote by Pulitzer Prize winner Herbert Bayard Swope has been encoded using the PigPen cipher.  What advice is he offering to you?

CIPHER.39.cipherString: Life is too short to repeat your mistakes, make new ones..!!
CIPHER.39.question: These strange headlines are a Baconian cipher of a quote by the Indian author Akansh Malik.  It starts out as LIFEI.

CIPHER.28.cipherString: Sometimes I lie awake at night and I ask, "Why me?", then a voice answers "Nothing personal, your name just happened to come up.
CIPHER.28.question: In his comic strip, Charles Schulz has Charlie Brown say the following which has been encoded using the Atbash cipher.  What does it decode to?
